review: This is pretty cool. I am able to get Netflix and amazon and wwe network all without running Ethernet to the bedroom. I was using the original Wii to get Netflix in the bedroom but since the Wii isn't in HD I was watching Netflix like a poor person. Now I can watch Netflix in HD like God intended. Plus I can watch the WWE network. The original Wii didn't have that.
author: ELRhodes

review: I was hoping to watch network television shows for free but that's not the case.  Everything requires a subscription which means paying out of pocket to watch just about anything, even hulu.com content I can stream on my laptop for free.

review: This is our second Fire TV Stick. We loved the first one so much that we decided to purchase one for our smart TV as well. The Fire Stick is faster and easier to use than the smart TV.

review: Easy set-up, but now when I change a channel (DISH Network) I get "lost signal" and have to move around on channels to get it to work right. Never had this issue prior to the Fire stick install.

review: We were using Roku for years before we got this.  We lost the remote to the Roku and couldn't use it anymore.  I love that I can use my ipad as a remote for this. Our Roku was an older model, I'm sure the new ones offer many of the same features now, but I'm glad we got this.  So far it works great!
